context: Post-brutal-audit action plan to transform repo from 87% theatre into focused, honest system
goal: Transform repo into honest, focused, maintainable system while preserving valuable work

structure.tools/integration_candidates/: Orphaned modules worth considering for integration

actions.rationale: Preserve history but make it clear this isn't production code

criteria.integration_value: Does this solve a real problem?
criteria.integration_cost: How hard to wire into core loop?

actions.method: Value/Cost ratio - high value, low cost = integrate first

swarm_bench.integration_path: Add swarm mode to evolve_loop, run N parallel policies
swarm_bench.cost: MEDIUM - Needs process management and result aggregation
swarm_bench.impact: Could accelerate learning by testing multiple policies simultaneously

boundary_pusher.integration_path: Periodic scheduled runs, results feed into policy
boundary_pusher.cost: LOW - Standalone script, just needs scheduling
boundary_pusher.impact: System automatically discovers its own limits

advanced_analytics_engine.value: MEDIUM - Better insights into learning patterns
advanced_analytics_engine.integration_path: Add analytics phase after each cycle
advanced_analytics_engine.cost: MEDIUM - Needs to export actionable recommendations
advanced_analytics_engine.impact: Higher quality policy updates from better pattern detection

complete_mycelial_integration.cost: HIGH - Significant refactoring of core loop
complete_mycelial_integration.impact: More sophisticated resource allocation and exploration

nos_pipeline.integration_path: Run NOS analysis after each cycle, influence policy

candidates_for_deletion: Modules that will never be integrated
process: 4. After 30 days in archive with no issues, delete permanently

actions.content: Diagram of core loop, explain each component, show data flow

actions.action: Update existing docs to distinguish operational vs aspirational
targets: MYCELIAL_ARCHITECTURE.md - mark what's integrated vs planned
agents.md - update to reflect actual production system

actions.content: How to properly integrate experimental modules into core

success_criteria.import_paths: All core modules import correctly from new locations
success_criteria.documentation: Honest description of what works vs what's experimental
success_criteria.integration_backlog: Clear priority list with value/cost estimates
success_criteria.ongoing_discipline: Policy established: INTEGRATE or DELETE within 30 days

risk_breaking_imports.mitigation: Update all imports, test core loop before committing

risk_losing_valuable_work.mitigation: Archive first, delete later only after confirmation

risk_reorg_churn.mitigation: Do it once, do it right, establish policy to prevent recurrence

immediate_next_step: Get user approval to proceed with Phase 1 (reorganization)

alternative_minimal_approach.description: If full reorganization is too aggressive
actions: Just create README_HONEST.md documenting what actually works
Add comments to orphaned modules: '# ARCHIVED - not integrated'
Focus only on integrating top 2-3 high-value modules
alternative_minimal_approach.impact: Less dramatic but still improves clarity

recommendation: Execute full Phase 1-5 plan. Repo deserves honest organization that matches its actual capabilities.
